offset.desc: An array of two numbers to offset the component horizontally and vertically in pixels
offset.desc_cn: 以像素为单位水平和垂直偏移分量的两个数字的数组

expand.desc: By default the component shrinks to content's size; By using this prop you make the component fully expand horizontally or vertically, based on 'position' prop
expand.desc_cn: 默认情况下，组件缩小到内容的大小；通过使用这个属性，你可以使组件完全展开水平或垂直，基于'position'属性

scroll-offset.desc: Scroll offset (in pixels) from which point the component is shown on page; Measured from the top of the page (or from the bottom if in 'reverse' mode)
scroll-offset.desc_cn: 滚动偏移量（以像素为单位），从该点开始组件显示在页面上；从页面顶部测量（如果处于“反转”模式，则从底部测量）

reverse.desc: Work in reverse (shows when scrolling to the top of the page and scrolls to bottom when triggered)
reverse.desc_cn: 功能反转（当滚动到页面顶部时显示，当触发时滚动到底部）

duration.desc: Duration (in milliseconds) of the scrolling until it reaches its target
duration.desc_cn: 滚动到目标的持续时间（毫秒）

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component
default.desc_cn: 组件的devland unslotted内容中的默认插槽
